dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev is skipping his 72nd birthday celebrations this year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev is skipping his seventy second birthday celebrations this year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev will not celebrate his upcoming 72nd birthday on May 17, the Akorda press service confirmed in a statement.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the Akorda press service just confirmed that—no official events, no parties, nothing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the Akorda press service just confirmed that-no official events, no parties, nothing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the statement, no official or celebratory events are planned in connection with the President's birthday. No ceremonial events are scheduled in connection with the birthday of Head of State Kassym-Jomart Tokayev.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And it's not even a one-time thing, right? Like, he's done this before.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's not even a one-time thing, right? Like, he's done this before.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This stance is consistent with Tokayev's previous approach.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. They mentioned that back in 2024, his team said May 17th is just an ordinary day for him. It's a personal principle.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. They mentioned that back in twenty twenty four, his team said May seventeenth is just an ordinary day for him. It's a personal principle.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2024, his press service noted that May 17 is just an ordinary day for the President " a reflection of his long-standing personal principle.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, so it's not just a political move or anything—it's something he's always believed in.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, so it's not just a political move or anything-it's something he's always believed in.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and apparently it goes back to his family too. The statement said birthdays weren't really celebrated, uh, for anyone in his household.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and apparently it goes back to his family too. The statement said birthdays weren't really celebrated, uh, for anyone in his household.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In his family, it was not customary to celebrate birthdays " neither for children nor for parents, the statement read at the time.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's pretty interesting—most world leaders would use a birthday for some kind of goodwill moment or public engagement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's pretty interesting-most world leaders would use a birthday for some kind of goodwill moment or public engagement.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: True, but I guess it's consistent with how he's operated. No fuss, no ceremony.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True, but I guess it's consistent with how he's operated. No fuss, no ceremony.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Do you think there's a message behind it? Like, austerity or humility?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Do you think there's a message behind it? Like, austerity or humility?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Could be. Especially with everything going on in the region, maybe he wants to keep the focus on governance, not personal milestones.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Could be. Especially with everything going on in the region, maybe he wants to keep the focus on governance, not personal milestones.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Still, turning 72 is a big deal—you'd think there'd be at least a small acknowledgment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, turning seventy two is a big deal-you'd think there'd be at least a small acknowledgment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But if it's genuinely his family tradition, you gotta respect that. It's not about the politics; it's just who he is.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But if it's genuinely his family tradition, you gotta respect that. It's not about the politics; it's just who he is.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Fair point. It does make him stand out among leaders, for sure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fair point. It does make him stand out among leaders, for sure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And honestly, after that pizzeria story last year, people probably expected something low-key anyway.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And honestly, after that pizzeria story last year, people probably expected something low-key anyway.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Read also: Trip to a pizzeria in Italy turned into an unusual story and photo with Tokayev

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, the casual Italy trip! He does seem to prefer keeping things understated.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, the casual Italy trip! He does seem to prefer keeping things understated.
